purpose: Highlight the increasing levels of burnout among employees, especially women.
narrative_role: Highlight the disparity and consequences of burnout.
title: While women ‘hung on’ in the last year, they are experiencing unsustainable levels of burn out

bullets.text: Employees who are “always on” are more likely to be burned out
Employees who are burned out are more likely than employees overall to have considered downshifting / leaving
more likely to have considered taking a job at a different company with a better work culture

chart.source: 2021 Women in the Workplace research, McKinsey & Company and LeanIn.Org
